channel.title: Soul wars
channel.description:
im 60 attack 51 strength 40 defence,
if i trained like 8 hours a day how long roughly would it take to get 51-99 strength?
*edit* 70 atk, 70 str, doing it for like 10 hours a day.

item.title: Soul wars
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

71 atk 80 str 60 def, going for 70 range, i can get 300k str exp a day now for like 10hours

Read full topic

item.title: Soul wars
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“Man UTD Freak, post:11, topic:273184”]It’s not really just a ‘few’ hours a day. 8 hours is more than or the same as half of the day if you count sleep. That’s just madness if you play for that long.[/quote]Some people consider playing sports for that long pointless and stupid, for good reason too. Some people consider working for that long pointless and stupid, for good reason too. This is all about opinion; if he prefers to enjoy his life playing games such as RuneScape, let him be.

Read full topic

item.title: Soul wars
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

OK.

It’s not really just a ‘few’ hours a day. 8 hours is more than or the same as half of the day if you count sleep. That’s just madness if you play for that long.

Read full topic

just because someone spends a few hours a day on the computer doesnt mean they don’t have a life.

item.title: Soul wars
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

It would take awhile. I didn’t bot, but I was at soul wars for multiple hours every day from 95-99 strength. It took around a week.

item.title: Soul wars
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

The problem with the bots is that they pick the balance portal, which automatically sticks your accounts on the shit team, which gets 1 point every game, instead of the desire 3. What you really need is for the bot to find out who won the previous game, then go to the opposite team, because if you watch world 44(Soul wars world) The winning team alternates every game.

Read full topic

item.description:

its a waste of time, the games are so far apart…

item.title: Soul wars
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

[quote=“kyled123, post:1, topic:273184”]im 60 attack 51 strength 40 defence,

if i trained like 8 hours a day how long roughly would it take to get 51-99 strength?[/quote]Please say your botting…

It really depends on how many you win/loose/tie tbh…It’s not like PC where you can say you get X many points an hour…Plus if your actually playing you’ll get XP from fighting as well. But All that crap aside, it would take you a long time.

Read full topic
